hero.title: Master Agentic Development

challenges.title: Change is fast & brutal
items: Large companies show us that code is becoming majority AI and agent generated
Available tools often lead to irrelevant results
No one shows how to use them professionally
Controlling these agents and aligning them with our needs is key

promises.title: What we enable you to do
items: Understand the new paradigm and leverage it
Do the work of 5 people with one
Move from *vibe coding* to adopt structured, reliable and reproducible programming
Scale your projects without increasing your workforce
Delegate to specialized agents, and put their power at your service
Cover the entire software development cycle with agents

orchestration.title: Agent Orchestration
orchestration.subtitle: The next level of Claude Code with intelligent orchestration and specialized agents.

sequential.title: Sequential Execution
sequential.description: Claude Code processes one message at a time
details: Each tool call is made sequentially in a message
Cumulative wait time on large operations

mono_agent.title: Mono-Agent Approach
mono_agent.description: Single AI instance managing all aspects
details: No role specialization (architect vs coder vs tester)
No multiple perspectives on complex challenges

memory.title: Limited Session Memory
details: Must re-establish project understanding each time
Loss of previous decisions and learnings

scalability.title: Scalability Challenges
scalability.description: Degraded performance on very large codebases
details: No automatic coordination for complex multi-step workflows
Limited management of large-scale enterprise projects

solution.title: The Orchestration Solution
solution.description: Our orchestration system is a wrapper that transforms Claude Code into an advanced collaborative platform. It enables parallel execution, agent specialization, and covers the entire development cycle.

batchtool.title: BatchTool Principle
batchtool.description: Encapsulates multiple MCP actions in a single message for parallel execution

coordination.title: Intelligent Coordination
coordination.description: Reduces network latency, token count, and coordination time

form.title: Book your free audit

additional_message.label: Additional message (optional)
additional_message.placeholder: Tell us more about your specific challenges or goals...

form.privacy_notice: By submitting this form, you agree to be contacted by our team regarding your free audit. We respect your privacy and will never share your information.

what_to_expect.title: What to expect during the call

steps.title: Introduction and context
steps.description: We get to know your team, current projects and productivity goals.

steps.title: Workflow analysis
steps.description: We examine your current development process, identify bottlenecks and automation opportunities.

steps.title: Specific recommendations
steps.description: We share 3-5 specific AI improvements you can implement immediately for quick wins.

steps.title: Next steps
steps.description: We discuss options for deeper transformation if you're interested.

what_you_receive.title: What you'll receive
items: Free analysis of your current development workflow
Identification of the 3 biggest AI improvement opportunities
Specific tool recommendations for your tech stack
Action plan with quick wins implementable in 1-2 weeks
Potential ROI estimate from AI automation
Personalized resource guide sent after the call

how_to_prepare.title: How to prepare
steps: Think about your main current productivity challenges
Prepare an overview of your tech stack
Note repetitive tasks that take the most time
Have an idea of your 6-12 month growth goals
how_to_prepare.note: No technical preparation required. We focus on understanding your challenges and goals rather than technical details.
